1.10.2.1.3.0: Added the ability to define books from resource packs, and form a configuration folder.
1.10.2.1.3.1: Guidebook will now remember the last reading position of each book (shared across copies of the same book).
1.10.2.1.3.2: Fixed lighting level changing based on gui scale. Added config setting for separating book scale from the main gui scale setting.
1.10.2.1.3.3: Tiny release to add support for going jumping back to the previous location using the back button on a mouse, as an alternative to the backspace button on a keyboard.
1.10.2.1.4.0: Some improvements to the ingame manual. Added config array for books to give on first join (works retroactively for existing players).
1.10.2.1.5.0: Added book loading from config folder without a books.json file.
1.10.2.1.6.0: Added support for web links, using href instead of ref in link tags.
1.10.2.1.7.0: Added rotating stacks with wildcard metadata and oredict.
